<color=#3487e0>[Precision Bombardment: Expulsion]</color> Select 1 enemy unit <color=#f26c1c>within a 2-tile radius</color>, dealing melee Physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>80% </color>of attack on the target and all enemy units within a <color=#f26c1c>3x3 area</color> around it, and knock the target back by <color=#f26c1c>3</color> tiles.
<color=#3487e0>[Precision Bombardment: Pillage]</color>: Select 1 enemy target within a <color=#f26c1c>3 to 8-tile radius</color>, dealing Physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>120%</color> of attack, and increase stability damage by <color=#f26c1c>1 point</color>.
Select the nearest enemy target, prioritizing <color=#3487e0>[Precision Bombardment: Expulsion]</color> for the attack.
data.descriptionBrief:
<color=#3487e0>[Precision Bombing - Expel]</color> Deal AoE physical damage to the target and all enemy targets in a <color=#f26c1c>3x3 area</color> around it, and knock back the target.
<color=#3487e0>[Precision Bombing - Plunder]</color> Deal physical damage and knock back the target. Increase stability damage dealt.
Prioritize attacking the closest target with <color=#3487e0>[Precision Bombing - Expel]</color>.

data.name: Relentless Assault
data.description:
Move towards the closest target and launch a series of attacks using <color=#3487e0>[War Scythe]</color> and <color=#3487e0>[Cannon]</color>. Each time the attack fails, use <color=#3487e0>Malicious Outburst</color> once.
<color=#3487e0>[War Scythe]</color> Select 1 enemy target within a <color=#f26c1c>3x3 area</color> and deal melee physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>60%</color> of attack to it.
<color=#3487e0>[Cannon]</color> Select 1 enemy target within <color=#f26c1c>4 tiles</color> and deal physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>100%</color> of attack to it. This attack increases stability damage dealt by <color=#f26c1c>4</color>.

<color=#3487e0>[War Scythe]</color> Select 1 enemy target within a <color=#f26c1c>3x3 area</color> and deal melee physical damage to it.
<color=#3487e0>[Cannon]</color> Select 1 enemy target within <color=#f26c1c>4 tiles</color> and deal physical damage to it. This attack increases stability damage dealt.

data.name: Aberrant Defense

After being attacked by a skill with a Phase attribute, if the affected unit does not have the corresponding phase weakness, it gains that Phase weakness; otherwise, it loses it.
When receiving Phase weakness damage, receive additional fixed damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>30%</color> of the attacker's attack and <color=#f26c1c>2 points</color> of fixed stability damage. <color=#f26c1c>Each time</color> a different attribute of Phase weakness is triggered in the same turn, the fixed damage taken increases by <color=#f26c1c>20%</color>.

data.name: Blusphere Basic Attack - Hard
data.description:
Deals Freeze damage equal to 150% of attack to the farthest 2 enemy targets and applies Frozen to them for 2 turns. Generates Frost terrain within 3 tiles.
Frost: Applies Frozen for 2 turns to units which end their action on Frost terrain, as well as Freeze damage weakness. Considered a Freeze tile.
Frozen: Reduces mobility by 1 tile. At the end of the action, if there are 2 stacks of Frozen, they are converted into Frigid, which lasts for 1 turn. Frozen stacks up to 2 times. Considered a Freeze debuff.
Frigid: Unable to move and perform displacement actions. Considered a Freeze debuff.
data.descriptionBrief:
Inflicts 150% of attack as Freeze damage on the two farthest enemy targets, applying the Chilled effect for 2 turns. Leaves behind a Frostbite area with a 3-tile radius.
Frostbite: Applies Chilled to enemy units remaining in the area after their actions end for 2 turns and adds Freeze weakness, whilst creating a Freeze tile.
Chilled: Reduces mobility by 1 tile. At the end of the action, if the unit has 2 stacks of Chilled, it becomes Frozen for 1 turn. Chilled can stack up to 2 times. Freeze debuff. 
Frozen: Unable to move or be displaced. Freeze debuff.

data.name: Shield Building

Generates a shield for the user equal to <color=#f26c1c>20%</color> of Fortress Titan's max HP. If the shield is still active at the start of the next turn, it will explode, dealing AoE damage that ignores Cover to all targets on the battlefield based on remaining shield amount.

data.name: Shield Building
data.description:
Generate a shield for self equal to <color=#f26c1c>20%</color> of Fortress Titan's max HP. If the shield is still active at the start of the next turn, it will explode, dealing AoE damage that ignores Cover to all targets on the battlefield based on remaining shield amount.
Shield remaining corresponds to the shield explosion damage multiplier:
<color=#f26c1c>60%-100%</color>: <color=#f26c1c>150%</color> attack.
<color=#f26c1c>30%-60%</color>: <color=#f26c1c>100%</color> attack.
Below <color=#f26c1c>30%</color>: <color=#f26c1c>60%</color> attack.

At the start of the turn, if this unit’s HP exceeds <color=#f26c1c>80%</color>, gains <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> and <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> until the next turn.

data.description:
At the start of the battle, the user summons 1 <color=#3487e0>Breath Pin</color>. While a <color=#3487e0>Breath Pin</color> is on the field, the user's damage is increased by <color=#f26c1c>10%</color>.
At the end of the action, the user may select any <color=#3487e0>Breath Pin</color> within <color=#f26c1c>9 tiles</color> and land on the chosen tile within <color=#f26c1c>2 tiles</color> around it, gaining <color=#f26c1c>1 point</color> of Confectance Index.
When an enemy unit within range takes targeted damage from an allied unit, the user launches 1 <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>, dealing <color=#2caadb>Hydro damage</color> equal to <color=#f26c1c>80%</color> of attack, <color=#f26c1c>2 points</color> of stability damage, and applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> for <color=#f26c1c>2 turns</color> to the enemy unit. This effect can be triggered up to <color=#f26c1c>2 times</color> per turn.
data.descriptionBrief:
At the start of the battle, summon a <color=#3487e0>Breath Pin</color> on an adjacent tile. Damage dealt is increased when a <color=#3487e0>Breath Pin</color> is present on the battlefield.
At the end of the action, land on the selected tile within <color=#f26c1c>2 tiles</color> of the selected <color=#3487e0>Breath Pin</color> and gain Confectance Index.
Whenever an enemy unit within range receives targeted damage from an allied unit, perform <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>, dealing <color=#2caadb>Hydro damage</color> and applying <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>.

data.name: Counter Armor
data.description:
When entering the battlefield, the Flareberus enters <color=#3487e0>Armor Mode</color>, gaining the <color=#3487e0>Armor Mode</color> skillset. This mode provides superior defense capabilities. When it enters Stability Break, it switches to <color=#3487e0>Flare Mode</color>, replacing all of its defensive skills with powerful melee attacks. Once the Flareberus goes into Stability Break, it will never regain stability.

When the Flareberus' stability is greater than <color=#f26c1c>0</color>, damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>80%</color>, stability damage taken is reduced by <color=#f26c1c>4 points</color> (fixed stability damage caused by exploiting phase weakness etc. is not affected), and mobility is increased by <color=#f26c1c>2 tiles</color>. At the end of the action, gains <color=#f26c1c>1 stack</color> of <color=#3487e0>{0}</color>, and <color=#f26c1c>1 stack</color> of <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>. <color=#3487e0>{1}</color> lasts only until the start of the next enemy turn.
At the start of the enemy turn, removes all of Flareberus' debuffs.
When entering Stability Break, immediately performs the final <color=#3487e0>Cerberus Attack</color>.
data.descriptionBrief:
When entering the battlefield, the Flareberus enters <color=#3487e0>Armor Mode</color>, gaining the <color=#3487e0>Armor Mode</color> skillset. This mode provides superior defense capabilities. When it enters Stability Break, it switches to <color=#3487e0>Flare Mode</color>, replacing all of its defensive skills with powerful melee attacks. Once the Flareberus enters Stability Break, it will never regain stability.

When the Flareberus' stability is greater than <color=#f26c1c>0</color>, it reduces damage and stability damage taken, and increases its mobility. At the end of the action, it gains <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> and <color=#3487e0>{1}</color>.
At the start of the enemy turn, remove all of Flareberus' debuffs.
When entering Stability Break, immediately performs the final <color=#3487e0>Cerberus Attack</color>.

data.name: Flare's Ignition

At the start of its turn, Flareberus cleanses all debuffs.
After it goes into Stability Break, Flareberus cannot recover stability under any circumstances.

At the start of its turn, Flareberus cleanses all debuffs.

Selects <color=#f26c1c>1</color> nearest enemy target within a <color=#f26c1c>7x7 area</color> and deals melee Physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>70%</color> of attack to them.
If the Cerberus fails to perform a melee attack after moving, it will deal Physical damage equal to <color=#f26c1c>100%</color> of attack to <color=#f26c1c>1</color> random enemy target on the map and applies <color=#3487e0>{0}</color> to them for <color=#f26c1c>3 turns</color>.
